description: This file contains test cases for the SQLite template used in project initialization, including fixtures to set up templates and configurations, and tests to verify project structure, database creation, variable substitution, and script execution.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Creates and cleans up a temporary directory for testing.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration files and templates for SQLite project.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Provides a sample ProjectConfig object for testing.

methods.name: test_sqlite_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that the template produces correct initial information, particularly the environment command.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Checks that project initialization creates necessary files with correct content.

methods.name: test_database_creation(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Runs the initialization script, creates the database, and verifies its structure and data.

methods.name: test_default_database_name(template_dir, temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensures that when no explicit database name parameter is provided, a default is generated or used.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Verifies that the post-processing script executes successfully and produces expected side effects.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks that project configuration can be loaded from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Ensures that template variables in files are correctly replaced with actual project parameters.

methods.name: test_sqlite_specific_features(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Validates SQLite-specific features, such as the absence of authentication parameters.

methods.name: test_entry_point_url(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that the entry point URL is correctly generated with the expected database name.
